website_summaries.verdict: A complete package that includes a stereo with capabilities similar to pricier models, including compatibility with devices and drives. A pick that the budget-conscious can appreciate.
pros: Combined with its Bluetooth capability, this system offers a complete package that includes a remote and 2 waterproof speakers
cons: Sound quality isn't quite as good as pricier models

customer_reviews.title: For the price, this system is a great value
customer_reviews.text: The receiver and remote are easy to navigate and have all the controls I want on my boat. I do love that it has bluetooth connectivity, which has worked well. I give it five stars because for the price I feel like the speakers have an acceptable quality. The speakers are not the quality of more expensive speakers, but with realistic expectations I was surprised with their range. They did not ship any mounts with the speakers, which was not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Brew Hawk 1518

customer_reviews.title: Great value and fit like a glove in my John Deere cab.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my tractor cab and pair it with my iPhone music and Sirius/Xm radio app. Speakers are compact and low profile so they fit in a tight spot, yet sound pretty good for the price paid. My only complaint is that the wiring details are not real specific and it took watching a YouTube video to figure out that the yellow wire is the memory wire (hot all of the time) and the red wire is the key switch wire (hot only when key switch is on).
customer_reviews.author: C. Waite

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 2017 EzGo TXT 48. Very good sound (once adjusted to my taste, Bass at +3, Treble at +7, EQ Off, Loudness on). Pairs immediately with iPhone bluetooth. The USB port does charge your phone as well. Now, its not going to blow your hair back or anything, but it does just fine for a golf cart. I broke my trim ring when trying to install and need to contact Pyle for another one, other than that, easy install. It was my fault, tried to force it. At this price point, you will be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience with this product
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very happy I was looking for low cost system to put on river boat first two times I went out everything worked great the third time I took boat out the radio shorted out and burned the ground wire in half at the plug in back of radio. May have been a defect I don’t know gonna use a blue tooth speaker from here on out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst Marine Radio
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work . Sent it into Pyle to have them look at it Cost $10 sent it back cost $10 the same way still doesn't work not willing to replace item for us we purchase it in January we live in Minnesota weather is not nice until June so we weren't able to put it in till then .Amazon said it was past the one-month warranty and Pyle would not help us with returning ....We only had it less then a year ... Yes it a Pyle.... a Pyle of crap.............
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER PROOF
customer_reviews.text: Used on the fairing on my bike in Seattle. The first time it rained it shorted out and would turn it self off and on. It dried out and still works but I know if I ride in the rain I cant expect it to keep working
customer_reviews.author: TechUser

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of time and money. I tried boosters and three different antennas and still would only receive 1-3 lousy stations. Absolute POS JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.author: dhopkins52

customer_reviews.title: Cheap already stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Used 3 times and Bluetooth just fried itself. Radio still works. Speakers sound bad,, and yeah it’s cheap but it’s not worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: All in all a great product and but the head unit is perfect and pairs with my phone instantly. The speakers are okay not the best but what do you expect for the money. I’m happy with it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brock hunter

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good for 2 5 inch speakers
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great and it’s light weight too. The Bluetooth hook up right away no problems. I only tested it out really fast before install, so will see how it sounds and last when it’s all done and working for awhile. Main thing for me is going to be how long will it last. It’s possible I will order the other 2 speakers.
customer_reviews.author: BugsMamaRoo

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works perfect. We bought this for our golf cart and the sound is great has Bluetooth speakers have good sound
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W.

customer_reviews.title: Super for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice combo. If you go to PyleUSA.com and register you will get 1 year free warranty extension.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Machiele

customer_reviews.title: Great appearance poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Failed after less than two uses won’t power on at all. Very disappointed because the product aesthetically is very well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Leckie

customer_reviews.title: Good unit/junk speakers
customer_reviews.text: The head unit is ok at best, I knew it was cheap buying it so my expectations are met with the head unit but I will say the speakers themselves are junk
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: this speaker kit works well
customer_reviews.text: We installed it on our boat, and it has great sound and is easy to connect to our phones to play our own music
customer_reviews.author: Julie Riley

customer_reviews.title: Do not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Installed the stereo and lights come on then turn off after a minute. no sound and I bought the warranty, cant get any help
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ac man

customer_reviews.title: Audio through Blue Tooth is Fantastic, not so much for FM,AM
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the audio sound received through the Pyle Marine Headunit in-dash LCD Digital stereo, it is great sound, but when playing the radio, no stations come in clear, all have static. For my son with special needs, who wanted the stereo for the radio specifically, it is disappointing. So I just Bluetooth radio channels through the Internet to get the great audio.
customer_reviews.author: Farfmjax

customer_reviews.title: Basic/works well
customer_reviews.text: Basic head unit, not much for settings works really good for a piece of equipment.... speakers a decent, much better then stock speakers. Connects to Bluetooth right away.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Narum

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are not very good. Stereo unit installed easily
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are not very good. Stereo unit installed easily. Seems to work as it should except volume is significantly less when on Bluetooth or auxiliary compared to radio. For the price it isn’t a bad package.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly/Brian

customer_reviews.title: Cheap heap
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Installed on my golfcart with the radio out of the weather. Radio only lasted 1 week then it shut off and never turned back on again. Would not ever buy this unit again

customer_reviews.title: Display stopped working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas, he got it installed in the spring and the display has already stopped working after only 3 months and about 10 uses. Very disappointed☹️

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the money. Wasn't that great about waterproof

customer_reviews.title: you did a good job
customer_reviews.text: it fit very good and it was what I wanted george

customer_reviews.title: best bang for the buck

customer_reviews.title: great product

customer_reviews.title: Great radio and speakers for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For $50 bucks with a head unit and two speakers it sounds great. I was impressed. It took me about 2 hours to install on my bass tracker 175, but the boat did not come with a radio from the factory. Can’t beat the price for what you get.

customer_reviews.title: Marine radio
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and installed easy without having to use instructions

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out of the box stuck with a pyle
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of the box, confusing wiring diagram ( red power yellow memory) purchased this in march installed 1st of May stuck with a "PYLE"

customer_reviews.title: Product price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and good for price. I usually make fun of Pyle but this is great for golf carts and boats.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was easy to link bluetooth and puts out high quality sound especially for the price point.

customer_reviews.title: but works better than I would have expected in my boat - ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, but works better than I would have expected in my boat - I think it was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio in March. It worked great when I put it in, but it has quit now so here I am five months later and I check on the warranty. It will cost me $30 just to send it to them to look at. I think I will take my $30 and look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: great sound - i have a jeep and needed a marine radio. many functions. blue tooth yes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: price is good for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money and for what i needed but thats about it, don't expect this super load high quality radio for the price. But definitely good for the golf cart install.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 5 of these I tried 4 different antennas and the reception is very bad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expectations met
customer_reviews.text: Good unit for the money. Sound is better than a smartphone speaker. Wish the display backlight was a little brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Read past reviews.
customer_reviews.text: The radio did not work right out of the box. I had an electrician stop by. He was dumbfounded why it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all weather stereo for my CJ7. Does it sound like a Sonos in your living room? No. If you expect that at this price point you're never going to find it. If you're looking for music from the radio, Bluetooth, or input from your device, you'll be happy with this stereo/speaker combo.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Shorted out right away. Went to walmart bought one at walmart for around the same price, and it worked perfectly

customer_reviews.text: The stereo blew a week after installing it. It's a piece of junk avoid it all cost.

customer_reviews.title: No engineered properly!!!
customer_reviews.text: Anything that runs at 14.4v ( pretty much all charging systems) will overload amp and make speakers crackle. Replaced it with Alpine, they can handle normal voltage.

customer_reviews.title: Junk

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Bluetooth connection per Pyle

One week after replacing, Bluetooth gave out on this unit too.

customer_reviews.title: Junkest radio ever
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst purchase every ant even had it hooked up in boat a week and it's already quit working junkest radio you can get..not Wroth it..
customer_reviews.author: rodrick

customer_reviews.title: More Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected for a low-dollar radio. It fills the hole in the dash of my Jeep CJ, and it makes noise. Perfect. Speakers work. I had zero expectation when I ordered it, and honestly, it was pleasantly surprised when it arrived. Radio and all functions work nicely, and they are kind enough to include some additional plugs for the AUX connection, because you know you're going to lose a few. Speakers are tinny junk - you're going to want to upgrade those pretty much immediately, BUT they do work. For the price paid, it is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Hoss Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a marine radio and the led display is not bright enough to see in the daylight. Where do you thing boats are used? Also My phone and my sisters phone won't play music on this radio like it is supposed to be able to do. I have had no luck with customer service. When I asked about the dim led display they asked me if I read the manual. That was the first thing I did. They gave me a ticket number, but I will be surprised if I hear from them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob v

customer_reviews.title: Great Head Unit, Speakers just alright
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Installed in a Golf Cart. Really like the head unit. It connects to Bluetooth quickly and works great talking through it on the phone even. The speakers are just alright though. Will probably upgrade them in a few months when warmer weather hits.
customer_reviews.author: 54warrior

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to install, sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Was easy to install. Still haven't figured out how to pair a Bluetooth device to it, but I also haven't put much effort towards it. There isn't a Bluetooth button on it, and I haven't had the chance to read the directions yet. Good sound comes out of the speakers. You can't beat the price. Bottom line.

customer_reviews.title: Works well

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Quit Working After 5 Minutes
customer_reviews.text: I hooked up this head unit and speakers to test it, and it sounded great. I cut it on one month later and now the Bluetooth function does not work. It quit working after literally 5 minutes of usage! I purchased this model exclusively because it had Bluetooth, so I have no use for it now. Very disappointing. I've had Pyle products in the past that worked great but this one is bad.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good unit for the price

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy install
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for the longevity of this product because I have only had it installed a little over a week. However it was easy to install and sounds surprisingly good. If you want much better sound, buy two additional speakers. It can accommodate four speakers but only comes with two. The AUX and Bluetooth connections are great.

product_meta.title: Pyle Marine Headunit Receiver Speaker Kit - In-Dash LCD Digital Stereo Built-in Bluetooth & Microphone w/ AM FM Radio System 5.25’’ Waterproof Speakers (2) MP3/SD Readers & Remote Control - PLMRKT46BK
product_meta.description:
Style:Receiver Speaker KitPyle Model: PLMRKT46BK

Bluetooth Marine Stereo Receiver & Speaker Kit, Hands-Free Calling, Wireless Streaming, MP3/USB/SD Readers, AM/FM Radio, (2) 5.25” Waterproof Speakers 


System Features:Kit Includes Receiver + (2) Marine Speakers + AccessoriesIn-Dash Console Marine Stereo System AM/FM Radio Receiver HeadunitBluetooth Wireless Music StreamingBuilt-in Microphone for Hands-Free TalkingUSB Flash Drive & Micro SD Memory Card ReadersAux (3.5mm) Input Connector JackAbility to Connect Additional External Devices (Smartphones, MP3 Players, Tablets)Rear RCA (L/R) Output Connector JacksIlluminated Button ControlsLCD Digital Display PanelID3 Tag Song Readout Information: Name, Title & ArtistRepeat/Random Music FunctionsBass, Treble, Balance, Fader AdjustmentEQ Audio ConfigurationUsed for Automobile, Off-Road, Boat & Marine Watercraft
Bluetooth Receiver Connectivity:Built-in Bluetooth Wireless Music Streaming ReceiverIntegrated Front Panel Microphone for Hands-Free CallingCompatible with All of Your Favorite Bluetooth Devices (iPhone, Androids, Smartphones, iPad, Tablets, etc.)Bluetooth Version: 2.0Bluetooth Network Name: ‘Pyle’Wireless Range: 25’+ ft.
What’s in the Box:Bluetooth Marine Receiver (2) 5.25’’ -inch Marine Grade SpeakersSpeaker Connection WirePower & Wiring HarnessMetal Chassis Frame BracketOuter Trim Frame CoverRemote Control
Speaker Features:Includes (2) Component SpeakersMarine Grade Waterproof ConstructionFull Range Stereo Sound Reproduction2-Way Dual Cone SpeakersPolypropylene Cone, Cloth SurroundMolded ABS Machined Basket and GrillFor Marine, Automobile & Off-Road VehiclesUniversal Standard OEM Replacement SizeIncludes Speaker Wire & Mounting Hardware MAX Power: 100 Watt, RMS: 50 Watt4 Ohm Impedance20 oz. Circuit MagnetVoice Coil: 0.75'', AluminumFrequency Response: 100Hz - 18kHzSpeaker Total Diameter: 5.98''Speaker Cut-Out Diameter: 4.92''Speaker Mounting Depth: 1.37''
Receiver Technical Specs:Single DIN Universal Standard SizeReceiver MAX. Power: 300 Watt (75W x 4)Bluetooth Support: A2DP, AVRCP, HSP, HFPMPX/PLL Tuning Radio SystemS/N Ratio: >60dBTone Controls: +/-10dBStereo Separation: >45dBReceiver Current Drain: 15 AmpDigital Audio File Support: MP3, WMAMaximum USB/Micro SD Support Size: 32GBFrequency Response: 20-20kHzPower: DC 12VReceiver Chassis Dimensions: 178(W) x 108(D) x 50(H) mm
The Pyle Bluetooth Marine Stereo Kit includes a radio receiver and (2) waterproof marine grade speakers. The kit's single DIN universal standard headunit comes loaded with features like built-in Bluetooth, AM/FM radio with 30 presets, USB flash drive reader, micro SD memory card reader -- along with an Aux (3.5mm) input jack. You will have the ability to connect and stream audio from all of today's latest devices (like smartphones, tablets and MP3 players). Bluetooth allows for easy wireless music streaming and hands-free talking ability -- thanks to the integrated microphone on the receiver’s front panel. Stream your entire MP3 playlist with digital audio file support, all while having quick access to the front panel control center and digital LCD display screen. The two 5.25'' -inch included component speakers provide full range stereo sound reproduction and are universal standard sizes for quick OEM speaker replacement. Upgrade your marine vehicle’s sound system with the Pyle Stereo Receiver & Waterproof Speaker Kit.
feature_bullets: RADIO USB READERS: Pyle marine receiver and speaker kit have an AM/FM stereo radio tuning. It also features USB flash and SD memory card readers with aux (3.5mm) input connector jack to connect and stream audio from external devices

LCD AND CONTROL BUTTONS: The in-dash receiver features ID3 that tag song readout for artist name or song title in the LCD digital display panel. It also has an illuminated front panel button controls for rear panel RCA (L/R) and preset equalizer (EQ)

BLUETOOTH AND MICROPHONE: Built-in Bluetooth for wireless music streaming receiver and integrated front-panel microphone for hands-free calling. It is compatible with all of your favorite Bluetooth devices like iPhone, Android, Smartphones, iPad, etc

2-WAY CONE SPEAKERS: Pyle marine receiver includes two 5.25” speakers with marine grade waterproof construction. The speaker is pack with 4-ohm impedance rating, 20 oz. circuit magnet, 0.75” aluminum voice coil, and 100Hz - 18kHz frequency response

STEREO HEADUNIT: The head unit receiver is pack with single DIN universal size standard at 300 watts power peak that supports USB/SD memory up to 32GB. It measures 178W x 108D x 50H mm in chassis dimension. It also includes all power wiring harness
